c74object.name: ears.paulstretch~
c74object.description: Implements the public domain 'Paulstretch' time stretching algorithm

inlet.description: Sets the stretch factor, either as a single number or as an llll containing an envelope in the form [[x factor slope] [x factor slope]...]. where x values' range depends on the envtimeunit attribute.

objarg.name: factor
objarg.description: Sets the stretch factor or the total duration, depending on the timeunit attribute This can be either as a single number or as an llll containing an envelope in the form [[x factor slope] [x factor slope]...]. where x values' range depends on the envtimeunit attribute.

method.name: list/llll
method.description: A list or llll with buffer names will trigger the buffer processing and output the processed buffer names (depending on the naming attribute).

attribute.name: spectral
attribute.description: If toggled, the algorithm works in the frequency domain, by overlap-adding FFT windows (default); if untoggled, it works in the time domain, by overlap-adding time grains

c74object.discussion: The original algorithm is by Nasca Octavian PAUL, Targu Mures, Romania, http://www.paulnasca.com/

entry.name: Inlet 2 (float/list/llll)
entry.description: Stretch factor or envelope. Sets the stretch factor, either as a single number or as an llll containing an envelope in the form [[x factor slope] [x factor slope]...]. where x values' range depends on the envtimeunit attribute.

entry.name: More details
entry.description: The original algorithm is by Nasca Octavian PAUL, Targu Mures, Romania, http://www.paulnasca.com/
